title: Resiliency
description: The ability to anticipate, withstand, recover from, and adapt to adverse conditions, stresses, attacks, or compromises on systems that use or are enabled by cyber resources.
key-ideas: Ensuring an application continues to function appropriately, as intended even when disruptive conditions threaten some aspect of the application.
Aim to mitigate the effects of: component failures, drastic changes in service requests or network traffic, natural disasters, hacking attempts, DoS attacks.
May be related to business continuity planning; highly related to high availability and redundancy.
